name: Ether (hatkirby)
description:
In the end, there is only Dust.

You are a creature made of light, trapped in a cave made of darkness. The twisting passages shift and change behind you; as if they were a living creature just out of sight. You can drop lamps to light up the way, but be careful as the dust kicked up by your lamps can break other lamps. And remember that no matter how hard you search, there is only more cave. The darkness always wins.

Written and developed by Starla Insigna.

The soundtrack, "Exploration", was composed by Starla Insigna & Emily Winds.

Audio Engine: FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd.
Tileset: 16x16 Top-down Tileset by runninblood
Sprites and sounds: CanariPack 8BIT TopDown by Canary Games
Player sprite: World of Solaria by jamiebrownhill
Fonts: Pixel Fonts by ChevyRay

Arrow keys / WASD to move
to drop a lamp or read signs
to open the menu

(macOS version currently requires macOS 10.13 or later)
